data.actual_result: The site shakes like it should, but changes the application in the dropdown.
data.expected_result: The application selected shouldn't change as long as there's unsaved changes.
data.short_description: [Website Bug] Selecting another application while you have unsaved changes causes strange behavior.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Developer Portal - Open the Applications Tab - Select an application - Change something such as the name. DO NOT SAVE YET - On the left, select the dropdown under "Selected App" - Select a different application.
